channel.title: I need help changing the quest list
channel.description: I need help changing the quest list. I have tried before and then I mucked it up really bad :( SO i got a new source again (EvilScape) and I have changed the emote animations pretty easily. Now I just want to change the quest list into things that will help people like..... main menu, commands list etc Please help guys because I would really appreciate it! Thanks, Darker Owner of DarkerScape

item.title: I need help changing the quest list
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“fusionflamar, post:1, topic:87329”]I need help changing the quest list.
I have tried before and then I mucked it up really bad
SO i got a new source again (EvilScape) and I have changed the emote animations pretty easily.
Now I just want to change the quest list into things that will help people like… main menu, commands list etc
Please help guys because I would really appreciate it!
Thanks,
Darker
Owner of DarkerScape[/quote]

client.java,

search for what you changing, so search whats where normally quests are. and then change.
to what you want it to say.

tada

Read full topic
